title: The Princess and the Pea
subtle: Fairy Tale (fiction), 351 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 480L
description: Relive a favorite fairytale about a sensitive princess and her sleeping troubles with this version of The Princess and the Pea. The story is told from the prince's perspective as he desperately searches the world around for a real princess to be his bride. One stormy night, a knock at the door brings a tattered young woman who claims to be a princess. The queen decides to test the young girl to see if she is the real thing. Will this young stranger pass the test and marry the prince?
